name: 8minSurvival
summary: It is a top-down shooting game where you have to survive for 8 minutes from pursuing enemies to clear the game.

name: 8-man Iriguchi
summary: Trapped in a shrine, you must navigate by following rules: proceed unless anomalies occur, turn back if anomalies are found, and reach Hachiman. This walking simulator, inspired by exits like "8 Hachiman," includes sound-based anomalies and mild horror elements. Playtime: 20-60 minutes.

name: 8 More Lives
summary: Lead a hardened company of outcast cat mercenaries through a gritty, low-magic fantasy land in this turn-based tactical RPG. Recruit, train, and equip your soldiers of fortune — each with unique traits and scars from past battles. Carve out your reputation among rival warbands, tyrannical barons, and night horrors — every decision in battle matters. Forge your story in a procedurally generated open world campaign.
